ess-beta-metadata.label: Value of UK exports
ess-beta-metadata.subtitle: Estimated total value of UK exports including trade in both goods and services (£ millions)
ess-beta-metadata.longDescription: This indicator shows the estimated total value of UK exports including trade in both goods and services (official statistics in development), in the UK, for 2019 to 2023.
ess-beta-metadata.caveats: Data for lower levels of geography (ITL2 and ITL3) can be found in the original data source or in the [CSV file](https://github.com/ONSdigital/explore-local-statistics-data/blob/main/total-value-of-uk-exports/total-value-of-uk-exports.csv) on ONS Digital GitHub.
